name: Lava Field
description: A recent lava field creates a barren, dangerous landscape with valuable mineral deposits, but the unstable ground and extreme heat make travel deadly. The cooling lava can form natural bridges or barriers, while the heat can be harnessed for metalworking or power generation.
atmosphere: Barren, dangerous landscape of cooling lava. World of extreme heat and valuable mineral deposits. Hot air scented of sulfur and minerals. Unstable ground and extreme heat make travel deadly. Cooling lava forms natural bridges or barriers. Barren landscape creates raw, untamed natural power feeling.
